description: A golden castle with Art Nouveau-inspired architecture located deep within the frozen region of Hyokaido. It serves as the headquarters of the Accino Family bounty hunters and features a tropical atmosphere completely different from the surrounding icy environment, maintained by Don Accino's Atsu Atsu no Mi heat powers.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Escape Confinement
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats escape from the holding area where they were imprisoned in Lovely Land.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of the counterattack phase in the battles against the Accino Family.

keyEvents.title: Rematch Battles Begin
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats engage the Accino Family members in rematch battles throughout Lovely Land.
keyEvents.significance: Multiple simultaneous battles take place across the location.

keyEvents.title: Franky and Chopper Defeat Hockera
keyEvents.description: Franky and Chopper defeat Hockera within Lovely Land.
keyEvents.significance: First victory in the rematch battles.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Defeats Brindo
keyEvents.description: Luffy smashes Brindo right back into Lovely Land after a protracted battle.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's combat prowess against the Accino Family.

statusHistory.reason: Serving as Accino Family headquarters and battleground

description: An anime-exclusive frozen region in Paradise (first half of the Grand Line) characterized by icebergs and glaciers formed over hundreds of years. The icy landscape serves as the territory of the Accino Family bounty hunters. Deep within lies Lovely Land, with its tropical environment.
